title: Large-Scale Analysis of Personality Traits and Value Perceptions to Promote Online Learning Adoption

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic online learning platforms and secondary-level mathematics proficiency
context.additional_context: Analysis of how personality traits and perceived technological value influence learning adoption in an online mathematics course for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the influence of personality traits (openness, neuroticism) on intentions to adopt online learning.
Learners can analyze the impact of functional, emotional, social, cognitive, and conditional values on online learning utilization.
Learners can validate research hypotheses by applying structural equation modeling based on survey data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
